title: Sea - Customizable Watch Face

description: Sea - Customizable Watch Face, by IntemporelCompatible with Android Wear 1.x and Android Wear 2.The  landscape is  changing automatically, depending of the hour of the day. The sun changes places during the day, and ambient light evolves.You can also choose to display 4 independant objects on the scene : - sailing ship- motorboat- lighthouse- cloudsYou can choose between a classical ambient mode (black and white backgrnound) or a simplified ambient mode (full black background) . The simplified ambient Mode improves the Burn In protection of the screen.Those settings can be set directly from the watch, or with the mobile companion.
descriptionHTML:
Sea - Customizable Watch Face, by Intemporel

Compatible with Android Wear 1.x and Android Wear 2.

The landscape is changing automatically, depending of the hour of the day. The sun changes places during the day, and ambient light evolves.

You can also choose to display 4 independant objects on the scene :
- sailing ship
- motorboat
- lighthouse
- clouds

You can choose between a classical ambient mode (black and white backgrnound) or a simplified ambient mode (full black background) . The simplified ambient Mode improves the Burn In protection of the screen.

Those settings can be set directly from the watch, or with the mobile companion.
